review: An excellent device to have for streaming any media from a small phone screen or tab to your big screen

review: This works great! I recommend it to everyone. I bought for my mom, nieces and nephews too!

review: Not anything like Apple TV which is GREAT.This just copies what is currently on your computer screen onto the TV. Useless

review: I liked it a lot, but sometimes I have trouble with synchronism and different devices.

review: Great for streaming some things.  I also have a Roku and like it better, but Chromecast is good, more portable, and does what it says it can do.

review: Very good devise, It's very flexible, and I can see any kind of videos from my galaxy S4. I love it,.
